<title level="1" right="Trait">[Fungus](/Traits.aspx?ID=77)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 632 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Fungal creatures have the fungus trait. They are distinct from normal fungi.
name: Fungus
